frontmatter.name: swPropMgrPageSelectionBoxStyle_e
frontmatter.description: PropertyManager page selection box styles. Bitmask.

title: swPropMgrPageSelectionBoxStyle_e
description: PropertyManager page selection box styles. Bitmask.

values.description: or 0x1; Specifies that the selection box has a scroll bar so that interactive users can scroll through the list of items
or 0x4; Specifies that you can select multiple items in the selection box
or 0x2; Specifies that selection listbox has up and down arrows so that interactive users can move items in the list up or down
or 0x8; Specifies that you want a notification sent when a user changes the selected item in a listbox or selection listbox
